title: _SET_USE_WAYPOINT_AS_DESTINATION
content:
0x6CDD58146A436083// SetUseWaypointAsDestination
void _SET_USE_WAYPOINT_AS_DESTINATION(BOOL toggle);Parameters:toggle: true to show 'Destination', false to show 'Waypoint' (the default)Sets a global mode which makes the pause menu map show 'Destination' instead of 'Waypoint' in the key legend on the
bottom of the screen.<!--

Name guess:

  - alphabetical function order, below [SET_USER_RADIO_CONTROL_ENABLED, SET_USE_HI_DOF], above SET_VARIABLE_ON_SOUND.

-->
